TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you have wished a horrendous wish with a dreadful corruption

I wish for a great day and night since it's New Year's Eve

Granted you will spend the next 24 hours trapped in the Earth's day/night terminator. Good news is you will not be subjected to some horrible fate. The bad news is that you will have to make due without getting to participate in NYE festivities.

I wish for corrupted dairy products which will be used as the fodder to produce the dankest, but tastiest, cheese every conceived of by humankind.

Granted, these dairy products didn't manage to stock the shelves.

I wish for more people to join us in corrupting wishes

Already granted. The others' wishes corruption is what the people do daily and best of all.

I wish What's App had the Apple counterpart  iT'sOk.

Pass, give wishes that are understandable 

I wish for you to listen to this song from Taylor Swift's album reputation

Nope. Sorry but there is a thread for that.

I wish that when you asked why something was borked when new content was created, that someone on the production team actually answered.

Granted, but they don't give you the right answer.

I wish Flirting With Disaster wasn't so difficult to play.

Granted, it went extra difficult, now it's not so difficult!

I wish to recover from my mild fever

Granted: You now have a mild chill.

I wish I felt enthusiastic.

Granted. Drink 5 liters of beer. Wait for six hours in the room. Go Run Crawl to where you know yourself. Finally do it. Feel ethusiastic and happy.

I wish the meters were not only cubic but also spherical.

Granted. You get a spherical multimeter that always rolls away when you are using it. Next time you should ask for metres.

I wish that the United States used the metric system.

Granted, the whole world use the imperial system.

I wish to have a great day

Granted, you find yourself on Venus, where the day is the greatest of the all planets. Of course you will now have to content with the hellish surface conditions and poisonous atmosphere.

I wish for a shorter work day at my present job.

Granted. They call it polar night.

How did they know that there is 100 centimeters in 1 meter?
Maybe they just imagined it

Granted... oh n-

[EXC 17:58:47.976] NullReferenceException
    UnityEngine.Object.get_name () (at <12e76cd50cc64cf19e759e981cb725af>:0)
    PreFlightTests.StationHubAttachments.TestCondition () (at <cd473063d3a2482f8d93d388d0c95035>:0)
    PreFlightTests.DesignConcernBase.Test () (at <cd473063d3a2482f8d93d388d0c95035>:0)
    KSP.UI.Screens.EngineersReport+TestWrapper.RunTest () (at <cd473063d3a2482f8d93d388d0c95035>:0)
    KSP.UI.Screens.EngineersReport+<RunTests>d__49.MoveNext () (at <cd473063d3a2482f8d93d388d0c95035>:0)
    UnityEngine.SetupCoroutine.InvokeMoveNext (System.Collections.IEnumerator enumerator, System.IntPtr returnValueAddress) (at <12e76cd50cc64cf19e759e981cb725af>:0)
    UnityEngine.DebugLogHandler:LogException(Exception, Object)
    ModuleManager.UnityLogHandle.InterceptLogHandler:LogException(Exception, Object)
    UnityEngine.Debug:CallOverridenDebugHandler(Exception, Object)

I wish all the mods for KSP were compatible.

Granted, but most of the mods are bad
I wish Tylo has a atmosphere thick enogh so i can aerobrake at it

Granted, Tylo's gravity went as low as Titan's. And it was toxic. Maybe hot?

I wish for some people to be safe from the new variants

Granted. You are now safe from the Ornithomimus variant.

I wish I had a cookie that was not rock hard.

Granted, now it's soft as a pillow!

I wish for some people to want me for what I am

Granted. Some people want you for what you are: two kidneys, two eyes, liver, pancreas, and other cool and useful stuff,

I wish for several holidays more.

Granted, we've had holidays once a week, four times a month, 48 times a year. And these holidays? Nah-uh. They're bad for everyone.

I wish for success on my project

Granted. The Matrix makes you sure that your project is successful.

I wish for MS Success instead of MS Access.

But it costs around 10^999^999^999^999 dollars

I wish that i dont wish but i do but i dont but i do

I make a wish, nothing happens.

I wish that Doodles would come back one day...
